answers.answer: Some of the symptoms sound like diabetes.  My cousin lost a lot of weight for no explained reason.  And was thirsty all the time.  He was diagnosed with diabetes in his 40's.  It's good that your husband is seeing his doctor to get an answer.  Try not to worry.  Good luck!

question: Can you tell me what might be the cause of my husband losing 16lbs in a week? He has no energy, no appetite, He can't get enough to drink, he says his mouth is extremely dry. He started feeling this way just this past week. Could you give me some insight as to what might be happening. He goes to the doctor tomorrow.
title: Unexplained weight loss, constantly thirsty, fatigued, no appetite
